name: proTest (itch)
description:
Planner, participant, or provocateur... everyone has motives; what are yours?

proTest simulates a 24 hour lifespan of a protest, played out across a 2-10 minute session.

Players grow their influence over the crowd by monitoring their behaviour, and carefully choosing how and when to assert their preferences.

proTest was developed by @MarowiTweets over 3 days throughout ResistJam.
